thread.section_title: Florida Law Advisers, P.A. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Florida Law Advisers, P.A. | floridalegaladvice.com
thread.title: Eric
thread.title_full: Florida Law Advisers, P.A. reviewed by Eric

author: Eric
title: Eric
text: I was helped in a very real way! I was told the truth, and given accurate timelines. FLorida Law Advisors help me establish a plan, follow that plan, and told me when I was being unreasonable. Sometime you need that, I needed that. They were flexible with me when I needed it the most. I would highly recommend them and they will be used by me again when the right time arises!
